mapper.insert:
insert into material_demand(mdl_id,buy_id,material_name, material_type, buy_company, price,num, provide_company,sure_material_mode, infos) values
(#{item.mdlId},#{item.buyId},#{item.materialName},#{item.materialType},#{item.buyCompany}, #{item.price},#{item.num},#{item.provideCompany},#{item.sureMaterialMode},#{item.infos})
mapper.select: select a.*,b.sp_name as name,b2.sp_name as name2 from material_demand as a left join sourcing_purchasing as b on a.provide_company=b.sp_id left join sourcing_purchasing as b2 on a.sure_material_mode=b2.sp_id where a.buy_id=#{id}
